projects.title: AnyTrac RFID Platform
projects.description: Unified RFID tag management system for Reliance Retail's Fashion & Lifestyle ecosystem, transforming inventory operations across the entire supply chain
projects.problem: Manual inventory counting was time-consuming (5 minutes for 50-item carton) and error-prone, leading to inventory inaccuracies (75% accuracy) and high theft rates. Needed a scalable solution for 1000+ locations with real-time tracking capabilities.
projects.architecture: Built scalable frontend architecture for multi-vendor RFID integration supporting Store Portal, Cluster Portal, DC Shell Application, Self-Checkout systems, and Trial Room Analysis. Implemented advanced routing with React Router featuring lazy loading and code-splitting strategies. Designed modular workflow system with role-based access control.

outcomes.description: Improved through real-time RFID tracking and automated reconciliation
Reduced through automated tracking and reconciliation
Enabled scanning 50-item carton in 1 second versus 5 minutes manually
Reduced initial page load time through lazy loading and code-splitting
Accelerated nationwide rollout through intuitive UI design
Reduced onboarding time for non-technical staff

projects.title: Reliance Foundation Scholarship Portal
projects.description: Comprehensive student enrollment and interview management system handling over 50,000 scholarship applications annually with streamlined workflows, automated processing, and role-based access control
projects.problem: Legacy K2 Technology system lacked scalability, had high maintenance costs, and slow deployment cycles. Manual document processing was time-consuming with high error rates. Needed to support 50,000+ annual applications with multiple user personas and concurrent interview sessions.
projects.architecture: Migrated from legacy K2 Technology to modern MERN stack architecture. Built complete registration workflow with OCR integration for automated document processing. Created Interview Portal from scratch supporting over 50 concurrent interview sessions with real-time scoring, panel coordination, and automated candidate communication.

outcomes.description: Reduced through OCR integration for automated document processing
Eliminated across all application touchpoints
Improved through MERN stack migration
Reduced through modern architecture
Enabled rapid feature development
Supported with real-time scoring and panel coordination

projects.title: Trading Simulator Platform
projects.description: Complete trading simulation platform built from scratch, enabling users to practice trading strategies with real-time market data and ML-based portfolio recommendations
projects.problem: No existing platform for traders to practice and learn without financial risk. Needed a scalable solution with real-time market data, sub-100ms response times, and intelligent portfolio recommendations to drive user engagement.
projects.architecture: Architected and developed complete frontend from scratch using Svelte.js. Implemented ML-based portfolio recommendation system. Designed for high performance with sub-100ms response times. Built scalable architecture supporting 300-500 daily active users with 40-60% retention rate.

outcomes.description: Driven by ML-based portfolio recommendation system
Sub-100ms response times for trade processing
Maintained throughout rapid growth phase
Processing 8K+ simulated trades daily
Retention rate across user base

projects.title: Reliance Jewels Integration
projects.description: Technical architecture planning and frontend implementation for jewelry retail platform with specialized workflows for inventory management, certification, and quality assurance
projects.problem: Jewelry retail requires specialized inventory management with unique serial number tracking, stone tracking, and metal purity verification. Needed frontend architecture patterns adapted to jewelry-specific workflows with seamless backend integration.
projects.architecture: Contributed to technical architecture planning through strategic design workshops and whiteboarding sessions. Designed frontend architecture patterns for unique serial number management, stone tracking, and metal purity verification. Implemented frontend components for certification document management and quality assurance processes.

outcomes.description: Participated in strategic design workshops and whiteboarding sessions
Designed patterns for serial number, stone tracking, and purity verification
Ensured seamless integration with existing backend inventory systems
